p: Hemorrhagic fever with renal syndrome (HFRS) is caused by different species of Hantavirus which causes fever, bleeding and renal dysfunction. HFRS is characterized by high mortality and is a serious public health problem. The annual number of cases reported in China is 40000-60000, which accounts for 90% of the total reported cases of HFRS throughout the world [1]. HFRS has been reported in 32 provinces in China [2].
